knimeNode.name: Table Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filter specific rows of a data table.

fullDescription.intro:
The node allows to filter specific rows of a data table by defining filter values in an empty table. Based on these filter values the node can either include or exclude rows of a data table. Chaining multiple instances of this node allows for complex selections.
Using the empty table as a filter: The values provided within one row are interpreted as AND conditions, therefore only the rows matching all conditions are filtered. The values provided in different rows but within one column are interpreted as OR conditions, therefore one matched condition is sufficient for data to get filtered. Choosing "exclude rows" corresponds to NOT conditions.
fullDescription.option: Include rows matching the filter conditions.
Exclude rows matching the filter conditions.
